data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Norfolk Southern - GE C40-8
data.detailed_description: One of the most popular locomotives with over 1600 units produced in various configurations. The "Dash-8" is a 6-axle 4,000HP loco that replaced the older SD40-2 units. Often 3 or 4 wide cab Dash 8's would replace 5 SD40-2's on many lines throughout the country.
data.about_the_game: One of the most popular locomotives with over 1600 units produced in various configurations. The "Dash-8" is a 6-axle 4,000HP loco that replaced the older SD40-2 units. Often 3 or 4 wide cab Dash 8's would replace 5 SD40-2's on many lines throughout the country.
data.short_description: One of the most popular locomotives with over 1600 units produced in various configurations. The "Dash-8" is a 6-axle 4,000HP loco that replaced the older SD40-2 units. Often 3 or 4 wide cab Dash 8's would replace 5 SD40-2's on many lines throughout the country.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
